title: Vanilla Cake + Frosting
description: A rich and moist vanilla cake made with coconut milk and vanilla bean, perfect for special occasions.
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour three 8-inch round cake pans.
2. In Bowl 1, combine milk, vanilla bean paste, and coconut milk. Whisk for 30 seconds.
3. In Bowl 2, whisk together flour, cornstarch, baking powder, and salt.
4. In a mixer, beat butter until creamy. Slowly add sugar and beat for 3-5 minutes on medium speed.
5. Add eggs one at a time, blending after each addition.
6. Gradually alternate adding the dry ingredients (Bowl 2) and wet ingredients (Bowl 1) to the butter mixture, mixing until just combined.
7. Divide batter evenly among the prepared pans and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
8. Cool cakes in the pans for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely before frosting.
